page.title: 14Our primary school.
page.content: OUR SCHOOL IS SITUATED ON THE SHORES OF INVERIE BAY.THERE ARE 9 PUPILS 4 GIRLS AND 5 BOYS.WE ARE ALL TAUGHT IN ONE CLASSROOM. WE ONLY HAVE 1 TEACHER WHO TEACHES US ALL OUR DIFFERENT SUBJECTS. WE HAVE A LARGE GRASS PLAY GROUND WITH A WOOD BEHIND WHERE WE ALSO PLAY. WE ALL STAY FOR LUNCH.WE BRING A PACKED LUNCH. WHEN WE ARE 12 YEARS OF AGE WE HAVE TO GO AWAY TO SCHOOL IN MALLAIG OR FORT WILLIAM.WE HAVE TO LIVE IN "DIGS" AND JUST COME HOME AT HOLIDAY TIMES.ALTHOUGH WE ARE DIFFERENT AGES WE ALL PLAY OUR GAMES TOGETHER. WE ARE ALL VERY INTERESTED IN NATURE AND COLLECT WILD FLOWERS AND STUDY AND FEED THE MANY BIRDS WHICH LIVE ROUND OUR SCHOOL.
